title: Can we make Krishna our friend ? | AAQ | His Holiness Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: So whatever be the relationship that is later, first of all, we have to cleanse our heart.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that everyone has a relationship with Krishna, but to understand it, one must cleanse their heart through chanting Hare Krishna, leading to a loving relationship that can manifest in various forms like friendship, servitude, or familial affection.
